title: 12-day Fly & Tour: Very Vietnam
inclusions_evidence: Economy class flights from Auckland to Vietnam with Singapore Airlines, departing on 06 Aug 26.

hotel.name_or_hint: Movenpick Hotel Hanoi Centre and Novotel Saigon Centre

items.label: 10-day small group trip with On the Go Tours

reasoning: The package offers significant savings compared to DIY options, especially with included flights and guided tours, making it a strong deal.
